      • getTradeRequest

        public Message getTradeRequest(java.lang.String content,
                               java.lang.String sender,
                               java.lang.String userA,
                               java.lang.String userB,
                               java.util.List<Item> itemA,
                               java.util.List<Item> itemB,
                               boolean perm)
        Return a new TradeRequest object
        Parameters:
        content - is the content of the message
        sender - is the sender's username
        userA - username of one of the user that is involved in the trade
        userB - username of the other user that is involved in the trade
        itemA - userA's items that userA is lending in this trade
        itemB - userB's items that userB is lending in this trade
        perm - whether the trade is permanent or not
        Returns:
        a new TradeRequest message
